ing.item: Cream cheese, cut into bits softened

directions.step:
In a food processor blend together the cream cheese and the jam until the mixture is smooth; add the raisins and pulse the motor until the mixture is just combined. Transfer the spread to a ramekin or small decorative bowl and chill it for 1 hour. Garnish the spread with the walnut halves and serve it with crackers. Makes about 1 1/2 cups.
